name: PaperSpace
description:
Welcome everybody, this game was made in short period of time in Godot and submitted for GoGodotJam 2021.

Welcome to PaperSpace! You will be in charge of doodle rocket in space and your mission is to keep PaperSpace from asteroid pollution. Will you be able to keep space asteroid free?

Short little space shooter inspired by Atomic Age Era and ballpoint pen doodles...

Enjoy :)

CONTROLS:

A, W, D or ARROWS -> Rotate and Accelerate (Move)
Spacebar or CTRL -> Shoot (you can hold it :)
P or ESC -> Pause
